title: Dota 2 YouTube Account Briefly Hacked to Promote Solana Meme Coin
contentSnippet: Hackers briefly seized Dota 2’s YouTube channel to push a Solana meme coin in a coordinated pump-and-dump.

title: Google Unveils Veo 3.1 to Rival OpenAI's Sora 2—But Does It Deliver?
contentSnippet: The upgraded AI video generator adds sound and precision editing tools as Google intensifies its challenge to OpenAI’s Sora 2.

title: Bitcoin miner Bitfarms files for $300 million convertible note offering
contentSnippet: Bitfarms will use the funds for “general corporate purposes,” including funding capped call transactions to hedge dilution from the conversions.

title: North Korean Hackers Target Crypto Devs Through Open-Source Software Hub
contentSnippet: Researchers say hundreds of booby-trapped code packages on a major programming platform were part of a state-backed campaign to steal crypto and infiltrate tech firms.

title: UK Aims to Repay Chinese Victims of $7 Billion Bitcoin Fraud
contentSnippet: The debate continues over what to do with the seized $7 billion worth of Bitcoin: Should the U.K. keep it or give it back to the victims?

title: SEC Chair Atkins charts pro-innovation path for crypto and tokenization regulation
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Paul Atkins is looking for cryptocurrency innovation to thrive as the agency forges its path in prioritizing the industry.

title: Benchmark sees more upside to CompoSecure amid Arculus’s evolution into full crypto trading platform
contentSnippet: CompoSecure's turnaround under Resolute and renewed focus on digital assets have helped lift shares more than 60% this year, says Benchmark.

title: Dogecoin, Bitcoin Treasury Firm Thumzup Weighs Paying DOGE Rewards
contentSnippet: Publicly traded Dogecoin and Bitcoin treasury firm Thumzup is now considering adding DOGE reward payments to its mobile app.

title: Are Perps and Leverage Creating Systemic Risk in Crypto Markets? Experts Weigh In
contentSnippet: Friday’s flash crash was largely influenced by a cascade of leveraged liquidations. Will large moves like this be the new norm?

title: Google’s AI Cracks a New Cancer Code
contentSnippet: DeepMind’s 27-billion-parameter “Cell2Sentence-Scale” model spotted a drug combination that made tumors more visible to the immune system, a breakthrough Google calls “a milestone for AI in science.”

title: Bitcoin’s October Slowdown Masks Strength, Analysts Predict Catch-Up With Gold
contentSnippet: Despite a comparably muted October, bitcoin’s steady performance near $110,000 and signs of Fed easing have analysts calling for a breakout.

title: ETHZilla Stock Falls After Ethereum Treasury Firm Reveals 1-for-10 Reverse Stock Split
contentSnippet: Shares in Ethereum treasury firm ETHZilla fell more than 5% after the company announced a 1-for-10 reverse stock split.

title: Zeta Network partners with Solv Bitcoin to build out a $230 million BTC and SolvBTC treasury
contentSnippet: Zeta looks to raise $230 million worth of BTC and SolvBTC in an Oct. 16 private placement in exchange for ZNB stock and warrants.

title: Printing Money: Paxos Mints, Then Burns $300 Trillion in PayPal Stablecoins
contentSnippet: A fat-finger mistake, or a hack? Crypto traders are confounded after $300 trillion worth of PayPal's PYUSD was minted and then burned.

title: Eric Trump Confirms Plans to Tokenize Real Estate With World Liberty Financial
contentSnippet: The World Liberty Financial co-founder said in a CoinDesk TV interview he is currently working on tokenizing a real estate project tied to a building under development.

title: Trump-Allied Erebor Gains Federal Charter for Crypto Bank, Shaking Up Stablecoin Wars

title: Dogecoin treasury company Thumzup Media explores potential DOGE rewards integration
contentSnippet: Thumzup holds about 7.5 million DOGE in its treasury, as of Sept. 30, and backed DogeHash with a loan to grow its Dogecoin miner fleet.

title: Ethereum treasury firm ETHZilla to execute 1-for-10 reverse stock split to help boost price of ETHZ shares

title: Polymarket launches up/down equity markets letting users bet on stock prices

title: Coinbase Rolls Out the 'Blue Carpet' for Binance’s BNB Token

title: Ripple CEO Bashes Wall Street Bank Opposition of Fed Master Accounts for Crypto

title: Indian Telecom Giant Reliance Jio Taps Aptos to Deliver Blockchain Rewards to 500M Users

title: Crypto Bank Erebor Approved for Conditional Federal Bank Charter by OCC

title: Crypto-Native Traders, Not TradFi, Drove Bitcoin’s Largest Deleveraging Event

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator

title: Judge tosses lawsuit against Yuga Labs over failure to satisfy Howey test

title: Early Hyperliquid user sells airdropped Hypurr NFT for $467K
